"},{"id":16,"type":"Quick-switch trade scam or attempt","victim":"| steamname: *Dandy* | steam3ID: [U:1:155376015] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:77688007 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198115641743 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/ | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198115641743 ","accused":"76561198138164837 (ᴥPosiedonᴥ 贸易)","description":"This morning I woke up and my friend told me he needed me to make a trade with a user. This user was asking my friend to pass me my knife to see that is not "bugged". I enter to skype to speak with my friend and I say him to be careful because I had all the earmarks of a middleman scam.I know this method as the palm of my hand, I have been a victim of this method and put into practice (without success) in my bad times. When we went to make the exchange between us I told my friend that I was not going to send trade request to him and SURPRISE a private acound with my steam profile copied send a trade request. My friend did not notice of that and directly he send me a request to exchange the knife so I take it. When I take it the user start gaining time and he start copining the profile of my fiend (*Dandy*) to send me another request to try to take the knife.","evidence":"Scammer acound profile: https://files.f-o-g.eu/fgabb6b93c1a9d8b7e328986cg4ca315 My friend profile (Victim) https://files.f-o-g.eu/7ea6895964a4d145gca066e1e3396egb The acound of the sacammer copying my frien acound: https://files.f-o-g.eu/29d2g3efagg30507c6608af6924344ff Last names of that acound (my name to "ExtremAdn") https://files.f-o-g.eu/ga3bdfaa0f8aa7700bbe6g8e2cdd0c8d The second acound sending me the trade offert to take the knife: https://files.f-o-g.eu/52154ddb69beegdcb9db93a22feee7ab The conver with scammer: https://files.f-o-g.eu/eed2e91bdfdcgb2a51dea8fdbc68fcda ","views":76,"protected":0,"locked":1,"state_id":10,"assignee_id":null,"creator_id":19,"modificator_id":19,"created_at":"27.07.2016 17:34:28","updated_at":"2016-07-27 23:40:31","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":29,"type":"Quick-switch trade scam or attempt","victim":"| steamname: Some Dude | steam3ID: [U:1:75798063] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:37899031 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198036063791 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/BessBessBess | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198036063791","accused":"76561198188025619 (Arged)","description":"Arged hosted a raffle in his group, and the raffle was for a Vivid Plasma Little Buddy. The requirements to enter were 1 key for 1 slot. So I gave him 6 keys for 6 slots and he accepted the trade. After this, I noticed he did not update the raffle announcement. I tried to talk to him about it but he then asked to borrow my unusual. Basically, this guy hosts a raffle group where he scams people out of their items and then does not give the raffle prize. He is also asking to borrow an unusual from me which I believe means he will take it and never give it back.​","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/0936b56c3155g6f0136e0e7cffacced8 - Shows how he obtained the keys http://files.f-o-g.eu/5bb0b99g791g361e698bgg34ea6c5f4d - shows us how he begins to ask for my unusual and how he wants to borrow it. He also proceeds to tell me, how I know he is not scamming. http://files.f-o-g.eu/caebcb989484gbf5b39beb0b9452c7bc - shows how he is willing to take my unusual for spots in another raffle and how he will "return it" in a couple of minutes. http://files.f-o-g.eu/a3a492ea034929aggbf72834c956619g - shows how there is nothing there. No updates or names there of me or another other people that may have entered. Be aware, this is on the day that I gave him the 6 keys. http://files.f-o-g.eu/b23d1eb5ae69ag6f4d3c3g9a9839b137 - shows how he accepted my trade and how it clearly says how it is for the raffle and I want 6 slots #2-7","views":31,"protected":0,"locked":1,"state_id":10,"assignee_id":null,"creator_id":23,"modificator_id":23,"created_at":"02.08.2016 17:01:12","updated_at":"2016-08-07 08:38:21","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":43,"type":"Spycrab runner","victim":"| steamname: Some Dude | steam3ID: [U:1:75798063] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:37899031 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198036063791 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/BessBessBess | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198036063791","accused":"76561198086719187 (Moonman)","description":"So one day I was on a Plaza Trade server and decided to Spycrab anything under 5 ref. This guy named "Dick Out For Daddy" came upto me and said that he was interested. We talked about doing a small pot so I bet my Meet the Medic Taunt and a KS Manmelter for his I See You taunt and 1 refined metal. We spycrabbed and I had won the Spycrab 3-2. The user then proceeded to have "trading issues and confirmation issues". The user then proceeds to leave the server but before that he changes his name to "a s t h e c t h i c" and disconnect from the server and block me from steam. I found his profile and he had once again changed his name to "Moonman".","evidence":"http://files.f-o-g.eu/9fbc27eb18b7ec7d2edc5adg06ece8ea - Shows My agreement http://files.f-o-g.eu/132ed2bgbaa2gdg9dg490ced21beddf3 - Shows my question to him stating if he agreed to the Spycrab http://files.f-o-g.eu/gagc2387c3bd2aed685d775e3392ab51 - Shows his response being yes http://files.f-o-g.eu/8b0040cff7ag0d4de863edfb17c1f2g4 - Shows 1-0 my favor http://files.f-o-g.eu/5ca428adgdg628egdc03ec10acaegdee - Shows 2-0 my favor http://files.f-o-g.eu/e77abcbdf39b42a48d209ae444g2cec1 - Shows its 2-1 my favor http://files.f-o-g.eu/b6b0ab53d4d81bde0aabag1f1b9dd60e - Shows its 2-2 tied http://files.f-o-g.eu/d28696ggef1f8e6age7f0gf181064fd1 - Shows 3-2 my favor meaning I have won the Spycrab http://files.f-o-g.eu/87g5122g9a7ef74fg51ee10e269a86ge - Shows how he is telling me about his confirmation issues http://files.f-o-g.eu/bf2fae9db8fc2431642ge079d2f13813 - Shows how he is telling me that their is no confirmation on his phone http://files.f-o-g.eu/2f92335ae6g76067082g8bdga11857da - Shows his name change to "a e s t h e c t h i c" http://files.f-o-g.eu/ddb0cd50e53f33c118e4a756ggc04f24 - Shows how he leaves the server http://files.f-o-g.eu/debcba0990eg565bd300fg8680g3ebbb - Shows his list of previous names which include "Dick Out For Daddy" and "a e s t h e c t h i c" http://files.f-o-g.eu/23be58d1bebd19bgef7ga5b7geda9gb6 - Shows how I added him, his previous name "Dick Out For Daddy" is still there and how his current name is "Moonman" http://files.f-o-g.eu/31b429c30ga4af8ec67c9acadg9ddgf5 - Shows how he then blocks me","views":36,"protected":0,"locked":1,"state_id":10,"assignee_id":null,"creator_id":23,"modificator_id":23,"created_at":"05.08.2016 23:42:17","updated_at":"2016-08-07 08:24:58","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":97,"type":"Other cash fraud (webmoney, bitcoin, etc.)","victim":"| steamname: millenium | steam3ID: [U:1:111087770] | steamID32: STEAM_0:0:55543885 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198071353498 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/StoutShakos | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198071353498| steamname: millenium | steam3ID: [U:1:111087770] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:55543885 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198071353498 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/StoutShakos/ | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198071353498 ","accused":"76561198043953852 (Qt Asian Girl)","description":"I met this guy off reddit, promising 10$ RP Code for 4 of my keys, he then said it's actually a 25$ code which i believed and sent him 5 keys as half the code. He refused to give me the code unless I added an extra key, this is when i realized he's attemping to scam me out of more and tried my best to back out. He ended up blocking me and spending all the keys (Full chat log if missed from ss) 7:20 PM - Qt Asian Girl: ahh that sucks dick 7:21 PM - millenium: wait, do you have codes or just rp 7:21 PM - Qt Asian Girl: codes 7:21 PM - millenium: kk, do you have any form of cash rep? 7:22 PM - Qt Asian Girl: No i don't 7:22 PM - Qt Asian Girl: Kinda new to this 7:22 PM - millenium: Would you mind going first for the trade? 7:22 PM - Qt Asian Girl: i'm kinda weary going first 7:22 PM - Qt Asian Girl: got scammed outta my plat 2 acc :l 7:23 PM - Qt Asian Girl: only got my d2 account left 7:23 PM - millenium: I only did this kind of trade one other time before 7:23 PM - millenium: I can get him to vouch for me 7:23 PM - millenium: lemme find his acc 7:24 PM - Qt Asian Girl: I've also done this once but with an amazon gift card 7:51 PM - millenium: gotcha qt 7:51 PM - Qt Asian Girl has accepted your request to trade. 7:52 PM - millenium: sent 7:58 PM - Qt Asian Girl has accepted your request to trade. 8:00 PM - millenium: sent 8:00 PM - Qt Asian Girl: o you only sent 5 8:00 PM -
